text: to (he nabee!) aap sahan karen, jaise saahasee rasoolon ne sahan kiya tatha jaldee na karen un (kee yaatana) ke lie. jis din ve dekh lenge, jisaka unhen vachan diya ja raha hai, to samajhenge ki jaise ve nahin rahe hain, parantu din ke kuchh[1] kshan. baat poohuncha dee gayee hai, to ab unheen ka vinaash hoga, jo avagyaakaaree hain
